name: SERVER
description: Server represents all Server controls in the Server side

functions.name: BroadcastChatMessage
functions.description: Sends a chat message to everyone

functions.name: ChangeMap
functions.description: Restarts the server in a new Map, restarts all packages and reconnects all players

functions.name: ReloadPackage
functions.description: Reloads a Package

functions.name: SendChatMessage
functions.description: Sends a chat message to Player only

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player who receive the message

functions.name: SetDescription
functions.description: Sets the description of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

functions.name: SetLogo
functions.description: Sets the logo of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

functions.name: SetMaxPlayers
functions.description: Sets the maximum player slots of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

functions.name: SetName
functions.description: Sets the name of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

functions.name: SetPassword
functions.description: Sets the password of the server, optionally overrides Config.toml

functions.name: SetValue
functions.description: Sets a global value in the Server, which can be accessed from anywhere (server side)

functions.name: GetValue
functions.description: Gets a value given a key

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback Value if key doesn't exist

functions.name: Stop
functions.description: Stops the server

functions.name: Subscribe
functions.description: Subscribes for an Event

functions.name: UnloadPackage
functions.description: Unloads a Package

functions.name: Unsubscribe
functions.description: Unsubscribes from all subscribed Events in this Class and in this Package, optionally passing the function to unsubscribe only that callback

functions.name: GetMap
functions.description: Returns the current Map

functions.name: GetMapConfig
functions.description: Returns a list of the Custom Config of the current map (stored in the MAP_NAME.toml)

return.description: A list of the Custom Config of the current map

functions.name: GetMaps
functions.description: Returns a list of all Maps installed on the server

return.description: A list of all Maps installed on the server

functions.name: GetPackages
functions.description: Returns a list of Packages folder names available in the server, optionally returns only loaded and running packages

return.description: A list of Packages folder names available in the server

parameters.name: only_loaded
parameters.description: Set to true the function return only loaded and running packages

functions.name: GetVersion
functions.description: Returns the server version

functions.name: GetIP
functions.description: Returns the server Public IP

functions.name: GetPort
functions.description: Returns the server Port

functions.name: GetQueryPort
functions.description: Returns the server QueryPort

functions.name: GetMaxPlayers
functions.description: Returns the Max Players configured

functions.name: GetDescription
functions.description: Returns the Server Description

functions.name: GetTickRate
functions.description: Returns the Configured Tick Rate

functions.name: IsAnnounced
functions.description: Returns if the Server is announced in the Master List

return.description: If the Server is announced in the Master List

events.name: Chat
events.description: Called when a player types something in the chat - return false to do not send the message

return.description: Return false to do not send the message

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The message send by the player

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player who send the message

events.name: Console
events.description: Called when a console command is submitted

events.name: LogEntry
events.description: Called when a Server log is received

events.name: PlayerConnect
events.description: Called when a player is attempting to connect to the server - return false to do not allow it

return.description: Return false to do not allow the player to connect

events.name: Tick
events.description: Is called every 30 ms by default. Only small operations should be performed here, otherwise this can lead the server to delays.
